all_keywords: High Pressure Oil Return Line System
all_concepts: High reliability with mechanical moving parts absent
technical_specs: Left/Right mounting possibility with the same TK3+ reduces junctions and components
Well consolidated steel with fused glass technology ensures no leakage
Well consolidated steel with fused glass technology with absence of seals ensures no leakage and good chemical compatibility.
Easy maintenance of the coil of the valve and of the Electro Optic sensor that can be easily replaced without emptying or depressurizing the plant.
The TK3+ is designed to control the oil level in the compressor crankcase in order to avoid the compressor to run without oil and so improve its lifetime.
The TK3+ comprises a solenoid valve for oil filling and a relay output contact to give an alarm.
Quotes in mm - L and L1 can vary depending on the adapter (see Adapters Addendum)
Suggested ordering codes not include oil strainer element. Adapters must be ordered separately.

key_concepts: High reliability with mechanical moving parts absent
iconic_quotes: Left/Right mounting possibility with the same TK3+ reduces junctions and components
Well consolidated steel with fused glass technology ensures no leakage

qa_pairs.question: What is the advantage of using a left/right mounting possibility for the TK3+?
qa_pairs.answer: The left/right mounting possibility reduces the number of junctions in the circuit, minimizing the risk of leakages and simplifying the installation process. This results in a more compact design and easier warehouse management. Additionally, it allows for simplified inspections and maintenance.

qa_pairs.question: How does the TK3+ ensure high reliability?
qa_pairs.answer: The absence of mechanical moving parts ensures high reliability, as there are no parts that can wear out or break. The sight glass and electronic LEDs allow for easy inspections and monitoring of the oil level, reducing the risk of human error. Furthermore, the well consolidated steel with fused glass technology provides excellent chemical compatibility and prevents leakage.

natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure range supported by TK3+?
Which refrigerants are compatible with TK3+?
file_metadata.summary: The TK3+ 130bar CO2 oil level controller features compact dimensions, reduced junctions for leakages, and high reliability due to its mechanical moving parts absence. It also offers direct sight glass replacement and is available in left/right mounting possibilities.
